name: Space Shock 3
description:
Space Shock III: Backlash is a simple scrolling shooter, whose purpose is to go through all the stages of the game and fight with the bosses.

Upgrade your technique!
Choose between mobility and survivability or damage and the number of guns!
Lots of different enemies that will force you to strain

7 types of weapons

4 types of bonus super-weapons

Hard and exciting bosses!

Black holes! Indeed, the most dangerous enemy of the game
